name: Marriage Or Pervert ~The Small Penis Warrior & The Perverted Magician~
name_original: Marriage Or Pervert ~The Small Penis Warrior & The Perverted Magician~
description:
A short erotic RPG with a playtime of approximately 2~3 hours.
1024x768 game screen resolution
Created using RPG Tkool MV

Recommend purchase with DLsite account for updates.
Confirm system compatibility via the trial version.

10 base CG (not including variations / pose art)
40+ erotic scenes (with perverted variations)
* The heroine is fully voiced for all erotic scenes.

Virgin Play: Possible
New Game Plus: Possible
Multiple Endings: Yes
Reminiscence Mode: Implemented

Features such as message skipping, window obscuring,
text back log, pose art damage variation, cum stains, implemented!

The more the heroine experiences erotic events,
the more perverted she gets!
(Her lewdness is even reflected in erotic scenes!)

4 different endings based on her perversion level.

[Story]

Set in a small commercial city, Burstvaltse.
There, the city's only warrior Hult and his childhood
friend = magican Yuria were living peacefully...
While they have loved one another for some time,
only recently they started dating.

All was well and good, they were thinking of marriage until...
word of a monster attack on the town spreads and as the only
warrior, Hult must head off with Yuria to resolve the problem.

But... never could they have known, what perversion lay in wait~
